悈字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悈； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页386第31
【唐韻】古?切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居?切，?音戒。【說文】飭也。从心戒聲。【司馬法】有虞氏悈於中國。　又【五音集韻】紀力切，音亟。【爾雅·釋言】急也。　又【集韻】乞得切，音克。駭而自專也。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　悈; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 386 31
[Tang Yun] Ancient? Cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Home? Cut, sound ring. [Said the text] Fu Ye. Warn from the heart. [Sima Law] There is Yu clan in China.　[Five Yinji Yun] Ji Liqie, the sound is urgent. 【Erya·Interpretation】Anxious.　[Jiyun] Begging to cut, Yinke. Shocking and self-professional.
